attributes.action: Get rid of the Ofcom Broadcasting Code as it is reducing our freedom of speech on the radio and television.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ofcom has made British Broadcasting too restricted and now presenters and broadcasters are too worried about what to say; reducing the quality of broadcast. Ofcom broadcasting code needs to be rid of before it causes the death of radio as it becomes too dull for listeners.
